      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,OD>> Network.ods
      Set of Origin-destination relations, so that ods.get(i).get(j) gets the OD that goes from node i to j.
      Methods in network that return OD 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Retrieves an OD-relation in O(1) time.
      OD Network.testDemandIntegrity(double tolerance)
      Tests if the total flow assigned on paths in the restricted choice set for each OD is equal to the demand, with a tolerance of precision.
      Methods in network with parameters of type OD 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void Network.addPathToR(OD od, int[] newNodeSeq)
      Constructs a new path object and adds it to the universal choice set.
      private void Network.minos(OD od, int u, int[] currentPath, boolean[] unvisited)
      The recursive algorithm that enumerates the universal choice set; its basic principle is that the universal choice set from A to B equals the union of the universal choice sets from the neighbours of A to B.
      private Path Network.shortestPath(OD od)
      Uses the predecessors of each nodes found by a dijktra's algorithm to determine the shortest path from O to D.
      private boolean Network.testDemandIntegrity(OD od, double tolerance)
      Tests if the demand on a specific OD equals the sum of flows on routes in the restricted choice set on that OD.
      Constructors in network with parameters of type OD 
      Constructor and Description
      Path(java.util.ArrayList<Edge> edges, OD od)
      Constructs a path from a set of edges, with an explicitly specified OD relation to facilitate certain method calls.
